attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: The false information and lack of evidence to back the information given is just 🙄😤🤢

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Honestly, I think it’s self explanatory of why this app is so horrible. If I could give this horrible app 0 stars, I would.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I can’t think of one good thing to say about this app. The app literally crashes every five seconds. I mean are we really surprised though.

attributes.title: This app is for racist bigots
attributes.review: This app promotes racism and segregation and is the main reason that the US is in shambles today this app should be removed effective Immediately because it’s so toxic🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: unacceptable
attributes.review: this app stole my barbecue from the fridge and ate it all! i woke up the next morning and it was gone! i told my hamster about it and he was furious so he took me over to mcdonald’s to get some more. next thing i know, my cheetos have become human form! i was scared for my life so i told my chihuahua to fly me over to the next country.

attributes.title: Weird
attributes.review: Broke my phone had to get it fixed absolutely horrible

attributes.title: Worst App
attributes.review: My screen turned into my worst nightmares. I never going to use it ever again; I don’t recommend it to anyone.

attributes.title: Horrifically bad experience
attributes.review: All it tries to do is get my personal data without providing any value

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app the next day I was robbed of my Dino nuggies and so the culprit of the robbery was this app horrible service and they took my Dino nuggies away

attributes.title: This app is very mean
attributes.review: From my personal experience I really don’t like the way this app treats people. I didn’t have a pleasurable experience
